title: Week 3 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Deucer’s Alley - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/20
description:
Waiver wire time! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason discuss the top waiver adds at each position and players to consider dropping. Plus, a recap of the Monday Night Football games, the latest injury news, and QB Streamers! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. Fantasy Football Podcast for September 20th, 2022.

Connect with the show:
